import React, { useState } from 'react' import ThrillerEditRow from './ThrillerEditRow' export default function ThrillerTable({ thrillerState, removeMovie, setThrillerState }) { const [flipEdit, setFlipEdit] = useState(false) const [editRowKey, setEditRowKey] = useState('') const activateRemoveMovie = (movieId) => { removeMovie(movieId) } const flipEditfFunction = (clickedKey) => { console.log('i have been clicked') setFlipEdit(!flipEdit) setEditRowKey(clickedKey) } return ( {flipEdit ? < ThrillerEditRow thrillerState={thrillerState} editRowKey={editRowKey} removeMovie={removeMovie} setEditRowKey={setEditRowKey} setThrillerState flipEditfFunction={flipEditfFunction} /> : thrillerState.map((p, i) => ) }
ID Name Year Personal rating Actions
{i + 1} {p.name} {p.year} {p.rating}
) }
